mapper.select: select count(case when task_type_id=1 then 1 end) as storiesCount, count(case when task_type_id=2 then 1 end) as todoCount, count(case when task_type_id=3 then 1 end) as doingCount, count(case when task_type_id=4 then 1 end) as doneCount, count(*) as totalCount from task where project_id=#{project_id}

select responsibility,name, project_id, count(case when task_type_id=1 then 1 end) as storiesCount, count(case when task_type_id=2 then 1 end) as todoCount, count(case when task_type_id=3 then 1 end) as doingCount, count(case when task_type_id=4 then 1 end) as doneCount, count(*) as totalCount from task where project_id=#{project_id} group by responsibility,name,project_id order by name
select responsibility, name, task_content, project_id from task where project_id = #{project_id} and responsibility = #{responsibility}

select pro.project_id, pro.project_title, pro.project_status_id, pro.project_start_date,pro.project_end_date, pmr.is_pm from PROJECT PRO left outer join PROJECT_MEMBER_RELATION PMR on PRO.PROJECT_ID = PMR.PROJECT_ID WHERE PMR.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} order by pro.project_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into project_language (project_id, project_language,project_language_seq) values(#{project_id}, #{project_language}, project_language_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select project_language, project_id, project_language_seq from project_language where project_id = #{project_id}
mapper.update: update project_language set project_language=#{project_language} where project_language_seq = #{project_language_seq}
mapper.select: select project_language, project_id, project_language_seq from project_language where project_language_seq = #{project_language_seq}
select * from project_member_relation where project_id = #{project_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
